name: Laravel + Node Dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'cd apps/api && composer install || true; cd ../web && npm install || true'
postAttachCommand: bash -lc ' if command -v gh >/dev/null 2>&1 && [ -n "${CODESPACE_NAME:-}" ]; then gh codespace ports visibility 3000:public,8000:public -c "$CODESPACE_NAME" || true; fi'
bash -lc ' cd apps/api && php artisan key:generate --ansi 2>/dev/null || true && php artisan serve --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 & cd ../../apps/web && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000 &'

bash -lc ' if [ -n "${CODESPACE_NAME:-}" ]; then echo "ðŸ”— Web:  https://${CODESPACE_NAME}-3000.app.github.dev"; echo "ðŸ”— API:  https://${CODESPACE_NAME}-8000.app.github.dev"; else echo "Not running inside Codespaces."; fi'
